missionProperties.startingObjective: Open a door to the hangar.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack either door to the Hangar (Health: 6, Defense: None).
{-} The mission will progress when either door to the Hangar opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You've punched your way through Weisss facility, ready to destroy the weapon, steal its schematics, and prepare for the Rebel fleet to wipe all traces of Weiss and his forces away. You didn't expect there to be nothing.

"This place looks pretty empty," your pilot tells you, completing his scan. "There are a few stray troopers, but nothing major." Upon landing, you see no signs of any manufacturing. When you reach the command center, the only thing you can find is a battle plan showing numerous angles of attack upon a section of ships labeled "Rebel Fleet."

You hear heavy footfalls behind you, and the doors leading out slide shut.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack either door to the Hangar (Health: 6, Defense: None).
{-} The mission will progress when either door to the Hangar opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You drag the unconscious, wounded Weiss out of his walker and bind him. Getting to your ship, you send warnings out to the Rebel fleet.

The battle had already begun, the Rebel ships drawn in by a smaller force, but your warning came just before the larger Imperial force moved to block retreat.

Though just barely, your warning allows the Rebel ships to turn and make their retreat just as the mass of Imperial forces begins to bear down upon them.

A transmission comes in from your commander: "We made it out! We sustained minor casualties, but it could have been much worse. We all owe you our lives. Thank you; The force was truly with you."

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Weiss shows mercy, treating you with every courtesy. Your wounds are tended to, you're given food, and you're even allowed a limited amount of movement within the facility.

The Rebel fleet is torn apart in the ambush above the planet, dozens of valuable ships lost. After the battle concludes, Weiss releases you.

"Your failure is so entirely complete that I don't believe you'll return to your Rebel allies," he tells you as he sends you out. "Good luck in your future endeavors. When the sting of this defeat has dulled, consider returning. I can always use individuals with your skills."

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.

entityProperties.name: Hangar Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
The door leads to the hangar.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: 6, Defense: None).

entityProperties.name: Hangar Door 2
entityProperties.theText:
The door leads to the hangar.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: 6, Defense: None).

globalEvents.name: Not so fast
globalEvents.eventText:
Always so desperate," an amplified voice echoes in the hangar as the door opens.

One of Weiss's modified walkers stands before you, aiming its many weapons in your direction.' "The slightest whisper of new weapons, new threats, and you risk so much on nothing but a rumor. How can your kind possibly govern a galaxy?"

"I was almost hoping you wouldn't be fooled," Weiss says, a note of disappointment in his voice. "Yes, the weapon is a complete farce. Your fleet will be ambushed and destroyed. If you do not wish to join them, surrender."

{-} The mission will progress when <color="red">General Weiss</color> is defeated.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack either door to the Hangar (Health: 6, Defense: None).
{-} The mission will progress when <color="red">General Weiss</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Respite
globalEvents.eventText:
Another of Weiss's walkers steps through the field in the hangar as you find only a transmitter in the cockpit of the first.

"You cannot win," Weiss says. "Surren-" 

There's a burst of feedback, followed by static. "Hmm ... " you hear your pilot through the comlink. "Well, that wasn't so hard." The walker swivels back and forth. "Just give me a sec to get the hang of this."

{-} Deploy an <color="red">AT-ST</color>.

eventActions.abilities:
Targeting Computer: While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.
Epic Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 3 attack dice. You may not roll more than 2 dice of a single color.
Awkward: You cannot attack adjacent figures.

eventActions.theText: {-} The Hijacked AT-ST is a Rebel figure. Heroes control it as an ally. {-} The AT-ST gains the following ability: Epic Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 3 attack dice. You may not roll more than 2 dice of a single color. {-} Instead of activating as normal, the AT-ST performs one action after each hero's activation. {-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters the Clearing.

{-} The AT-ST is a Rebel figure. Heroes control it as an ally. {-} The AT-ST gains the following ability: Epic Arsenal: Your attack pool consists of any combination of 3 attack dice. You may not roll more than 2 dice of a single color. {-} Instead of activating as normal, the AT-ST performs one action after each hero's activation. {-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters the Clearing.

globalEvents.name: The Bitter End
globalEvents.eventText:
Another of the modified walkers stands in the way, this one featuring even more armor plating and weaponry. Weiss leans out of the top, shaking his head. "Very clever, intercepting my signal. Too clever for your own good." He descends into the cockpit.

Behind you, all doors slam shut.
